name: Blasterjaxx (the goats)
description: '''Blasterjaxx''' is a Dutch [[Disc jockey|DJ]] and record production duo composed of Thom Jongkind (born 1990) and Idir Makhlaf (born 1991), originated in [[The Hague]] and active since 2010. They are mostly known for producing [[big room house]] and [[electro house]] music, being more active in the first genre.
